description:
Seina Yamada has been waiting so long to return to his home, Earth.
But so much has changed; his sister is engaged to Kiriko`s brother Kai,
and his parents` old store is now a huge mall.
Furthermore, he is to stay at Kiriko`s mother`s house...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Back... to My Old Home? From Renza-
Natsukashi no Wagaya... e? Renza yori
懐かしの我が家... へ? 簾座より―
